active.docs:
**, boolean**: Whether the menu should start as active, meaning accepting user interactions and displaying output. Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#overview)*

mode.docs:
**, enum**: Defines the navigation logic. Defaults to `rotary`.
  * `rotary`: Rotary mode expects the clockwise movement wired to [display_menu.down](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-down-action), the anticlockwise one to [display_menu.up](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-up-action) and the switch to [display_menu.enter](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-enter-action) action.
  
  * `joystick`: Joystick mode expects the up, down, left and right buttons wired to the [display_menu.up](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-up-action), [display_menu.down](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-down-action), [display_menu.left](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-left-action) and [display_menu.right](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-right-action) actions and the middle button to the [display_menu.enter](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-enter-action) action.
  
  

*See also: [Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#overview)*

joystick.docs: Joystick mode expects the up, down, left and right buttons wired to the [display_menu.up](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-up-action), [display_menu.down](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-down-action), [display_menu.left](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-left-action) and [display_menu.right](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-right-action) actions and the middle button to the [display_menu.enter](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-enter-action) action.

rotary.docs: Rotary mode expects the clockwise movement wired to [display_menu.down](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-down-action), the anticlockwise one to [display_menu.up](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-up-action) and the switch to [display_menu.enter](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/index.html#display-menu-enter-action) action.
